title: Amazing Animal Adaptations
description: Discover the incredible ways animals have evolved to survive in their environments.

questions.question: What is the term for an animal that can change its body color to match its surroundings?
The camel's hump stores what to help it survive in the desert?
Which animal can survive being frozen solid and thaw back to life?
The bombardier beetle defends itself by doing what?
options: Spraying boiling chemicals from its abdomen

questions.question: What adaptation allows deep-sea fish to produce their own light?
The mimic octopus can imitate the appearance of approximately how many other species?
Elephants use their large ears primarily for what purpose?
The spitting cobra can accurately aim venom at a target's eyes from what distance?
Which bird builds its nest using its own saliva, creating a delicacy in some Asian cuisines?
The Arctic woolly bear caterpillar survives freezing temperatures and takes how many years to become a moth?
What unique adaptation allows a woodpecker to hammer trees without getting brain damage?
options: A thick skull and specialized hyoid bone

questions.question: The pistol shrimp stuns prey by doing what?
options: Snapping its claw to create a shockwave

questions.question: Hibernation, estivation, and torpor are all forms of what survival strategy?
The tardigrade (water bear) can survive in which extreme environment?
What adaptation allows the basilisk lizard to run across the surface of water?
options: Lightweight body and fringed toes that create air pockets
